title: index ©U-M Photo Services, Paul Jaronski ABOUT THE author John Pedley is Professor Emeritus of Classical Archaeology and Greek at the University of Michigan. Trained at Cambridge and Harvard, and former Director of the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology at Michigan, he has excavated in Britain
He is the author of numerous articles and books, among them Sanctuaries and the Sacred in the Ancient Greek World (2005) and most recently a biography of Francis Kelsey
